casebody.data:
State
v.
Melissa Amber Dalton 336PA15-1 Supreme Court of North Carolina. June 13, 2016 Ann B. Petersen, Attorney at Law, Chapel Hill, for Dalton, Melissa Amber. Jess D. Mekeel, Assistant Attorney General, Greg Newman, District Attorney, for State of North Carolina.

James R. Glover, Attorney at Law, Chapel Hill.

The following order has been entered on the Motion for Extension of Time to File Brief filed on the 10th of June 2016 by Defendant:

"Motion Allowed by order of the Court in conference, this the 13th of June 2016."

*5Defendant shall have up to and including the 20th day of July 2016 to file and serve his/her brief with this Court.
